input.sentences: [male] started his vacation in the morning .
he always gets hungry after waking up .
the ski lifts took him to the sky .
a fun ride made [male] 's hair look funny afterward .
he left the vacation spot feeling satisfied .
output.sentences: It was a sunny day in Spain.
The ice-cream sellers are hard at work.
People love to travel by air lifts to see a magical fairground east of the beach.
Everyone likes to get high on the main attraction!
Little did they know the fairground was only an oasis caused by the heat.
